issue.title: [C++] Implement example string scalar kernel function to assist with string kernels buildout per ARROW-555
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8922](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8922). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I will write a patch to provide an example of creating a string-input string-output kernel for executing scalar-valued string functions

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8922?focusedCommentId=17120527) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7278
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7278>
